title.narrative: Equitable and sustainable access to WASH

description.narrative: This project will address WASH problems by increasing water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) coverage contributing towards reaching the MDGs on water and sanitation, in all the 5 districts. Over the 3 years, It will enable over 19,571 community members to access safe water through the construction of

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
